p: PM does not participate in autonomous synthesis of its structural lipids, as above mentioned. However, in several signaling cascades, the synthesis or degradation of lipids at the PM has been extensively reported [ 60]. For SM turnover, for example, the PM contains sphingomyelin synthase 2 (SMS2), which allows the (re)synthesis of SM from Cer at PM and even has a partial effect on whole cell SM content [ 61, 62].
